name: SurfClust
author: AFNI Developers
description: A program to perform clustering analysis surfaces

inputs.description: The surface spec file
inputs.name: Spec file

inputs.description: The input surface name
inputs.name: Input surface name

inputs.description: Full name of the input surface
inputs.name: Input surface file

inputs.description: The input dataset and the index of the datacolumn to use (index 0 for 1st column). Values of 0 indicate inactive nodes.
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Maximum distance between an activated node and the cluster to which it belongs.
inputs.name: RMM radius

inputs.description: Minimum area for clusters
inputs.name: Minimum area

inputs.description: Minimum nodes for clusters
inputs.name: Minimum nodes

inputs.description: Prefix for output. Default is the prefix of the input dataset.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Output a clustered version of input dataset
inputs.name: Output clustered dataset

inputs.description: Output an ROI dataset with the rank of its cluster
inputs.name: Output ROI dataset

inputs.description: Output a value for all nodes of input surface
inputs.name: Output full list

inputs.description: No sorting of ROI clusters
inputs.name: Sort none

inputs.description: Sorting based on number of nodes in cluster
inputs.name: Sort by number of nodes

inputs.description: Sorting based on area of clusters (default)
inputs.name: Sort by area

inputs.description: Index of thresholding column. Default is column 0.
inputs.name: Threshold column index

inputs.description: Apply thresholding prior to clustering.
inputs.name: Threshold value

inputs.description: Apply absolute thresholding prior to clustering
inputs.name: Absolute threshold value

inputs.description: Apply thresholding in range. A node n is considered if thresh_col[n] >= R0 && thresh_col[n] <= R1
inputs.name: In range threshold

inputs.description: Apply thresholding outside of range. A node n is considered if thresh_col[n] < R0 || thresh_col[n] > R1
inputs.name: Out of range threshold

inputs.description: Force the output dataset to have node indices in column 0 of output.
inputs.name: Prepend node index

inputs.description: Pacify me when perc of the data have been processed. perc is between 1% and 50%. Default is no update.
inputs.name: Update percentage

inputs.description: Do not find the central nodes
inputs.name: Do not find central nodes

inputs.description: Do find the central nodes (default)
inputs.name: Find central nodes

inputs.description: Ignore any Rotate, Volreg, Tagalign, or WarpDrive transformations present in the Surface Volume.
inputs.name: Ignore volume registrations

inputs.description: Same as -novolreg
inputs.name: Ignore transformations

inputs.description: Set environment variable ENVname to be ENVvalue. Quotes are necessary.
inputs.name: Set environment variable

inputs.description: Turns on In/Out debug and Memory tracing.
inputs.name: Trace

inputs.description: Turns on extreme tracing.
inputs.name: Extreme trace

inputs.description: Turn off memory tracing.
inputs.name: Turn off memory tracing

inputs.description: Turn on memory tracing (default).
inputs.name: Turn on memory tracing

inputs.description: Mini help, same as -help in many cases.
inputs.name: Mini help

inputs.description: The entire help output.
inputs.name: Help

inputs.description: Extreme help, same as -help in majority of cases.
inputs.name: Extreme help

inputs.description: Open help in text editor. AFNI will try to find a GUI editor on your machine. You can control which it should use by setting environment variable AFNI_GUI_EDITOR.
inputs.name: Open help in editor

inputs.description: Open help in web browser. AFNI will try to find a browser. You can control which it should use by setting environment variable AFNI_GUI_EDITOR.
inputs.name: Open help in web browser

inputs.description: Look for lines in this program's -help output that match (approximately) the given word.
inputs.name: Find help keyword

inputs.description: Help string unedited.
inputs.name: Raw help string

inputs.description: Help string in sphinx format, but do not try to autoformat.
inputs.name: Sphinx help

inputs.description: Help string in sphinx format with autoformatting of options.
inputs.name: Autoformat sphinx help

output-files.description: ROI dataset with rank of clusters
output-files.name: ROI dataset
